name: part_005
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE【チラ見せ】 [wCblx1C_j68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: A montage of fan-made messages and illustrations supporting hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony is displayed over instrumental background music.
The main event visual for 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony' is shown with a waiting screen message.
An 'Attention' slide for visitors provides guidelines for the performance, including lighting and cheering protocols.
A 'PENLIGHT COLORS' chart is displayed, listing official colors for various hololive members.
The montage of fan messages and illustrations continues until the end of the clip.

subtitles.original:

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ

subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
